actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Cotton, Rice, and Sugar.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains
Subcommittee on Cotton, Rice, and Sugar

official_title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to authorize the transfer of crop acreage base between program crops on a farm and the establishment of a farm program payment yield for the program crop receiving such base on behalf of producers adversely affected by an irrigation water shortage.
short_title: Program Crop Acreage Base Transfer Act of 1992

summary.text: Program Crop Acreage Base Transfer Act of 1992 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to provide for the transfer of crop acreage bases and establishment of a farm program payment yield as a result of irrigation water shortages.

titles.title: Program Crop Acreage Base Transfer Act of 1992

To amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to authorize the transfer of crop acreage base between program crops on a farm and the establishment of a farm program payment yield for the program crop receiving such base on behalf of producers adversely affected by an irrigation water shortage.
